title: What were GOOGLâ€™s hedging gains (losses) as a percentage of the total FX revenue impact for Q2 FY2025?
description:
1. Retrieve Q2 FY2025 hedging gains/(losses): $(112) million.
 
 2. Retrieve Q2-FY2025 total FX revenue impact = $543 million. 
 
 3. Calculate hedging losses as a percentage of the total FX revenue impact as (-$112 million / $543 million) * 100 = -20.63%

rubric.criteria: Q2 FY2025 total FX revenue impact = $543 million
Hedging losses as percentage of total FX revenue impact = (-$112 million / $543 million) * 100 = -20.63%
